global-margin-l"><div class="analytics-scroll-point" id="release" style="display:inline"></div><div class="releaseLimit_releaseLimit__hPlRO"><article class="release"><time class="release_date__P0TR_">March 3, 2022</time><h2 class="title_title__DWL5N title_titleSizeM__e46NM title_titleWeightBold__838EK title_titleFamilyInter__Ra6_Q">Connect your tools with the API ðŸ§°</h2><div class="jsx-b196e439675d943 global-margin-xs"><article class="contentfulRichText_richText__rW7Oq contentfulRichText_sans__UVbfz" style="--rich-text-font-config-font-size:var(--typography-sans-200-regular-font-size);--rich-text-font-config-line-height:var(--typography-sans-200-regular-line-height);--rich-text-font-config-font-family:var(--font-family-sans);--rich-text-font-config-font-variant-numeric:normal;--rich-text-font-config-color:inherit"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><div class="contentfulRichTextLayout_rtSpacingS__fOW8p"><div class="callout_callout__f6e0w"><div class="callout_imageWrap__LbKoT"><span style="box-sizing:border-box;display:block;overflow:hidden;width:initial;height:initial;background:none;opacity:1;border:0;margin:0;padding:0;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;bottom:0;right:0"><img alt="" role="presentation" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" decoding="async" data-nimg="fill" class="next-image" alt="" role="presentation" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-nimg="fill" class="next-image" sizes="100vw" srcSet="/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,width=640,quality=100/front-static/shared/callouts/note-illustration.png 640w, class="callout_calloutTitle__9qiON"></p><div class="callout_richTextWrap__vvnL1"><article class="contentfulRichText_richText__rW7Oq contentfulRichText_sans__UVbfz" style="--rich-text-font-config-font-size:var(--typography-sans-150-regular-font-size);--rich-text-font-config-line-height:var(--typography-sans-150-regular-line-height);--rich-text-font-config-font-family:var(--font-family-sans);--rich-text-font-config-font-variant-numeric:normal;--rich-text-font-config-color:inherit"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Yesterday, thousands of folks from around the world came together at our second annual conference, <strong class="contentfulRichText_strong__MaH0M">Block by Block 2022</strong>! We announced new features and programs, and learned from amazing speakers like Martha Stewart and Ira Glass.</p></div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><ul class="contentfulRichText_list__89IEM"><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE"><a href="https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzaYMdbJMZW1JsD68HJRRqK_kQr9zAC6r" class="InlineTextLink_inlineLink__oN8YM InlineTextLink_colorInherit__oGlTG">Watch the recordings here â†’</a></p></div></li><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE"><a href="https://www.notion.so/blog/block-by-block-recap-2022" class="InlineTextLink_inlineLink__oN8YM InlineTextLink_colorInherit__oGlTG">Catch up on all the features and programs we announced â†’</a></p></div></li></ul></div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Better Databases with quick filters, the redesigned Teams sidebar, and Synced Databases will be released in the coming weeks and months â€” stay tuned. To learn more about what you can start using today, read on:</p></div></article></div></div></div></div> </div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><div class="contentfulRichText_titleSpacingH3__wUQTI"><h3 id="the-api-is-out-of-beta" class="title_title__DWL5N title_titleSizeS__om4Io title_titleWeightSemibold__RAo21 title_titleFamilyInter__Ra6_Q">The API is out of beta</h3></div></div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Since we launched the API into beta last year, over 30,000 people have joined our developer community, building everything from workflow automations and content publishing systems, to productivity tools and search aggregators, all on the Notion platform.</p></div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">And for the last several months, weâ€™ve been working hard to expand the APIâ€™s capabilities to make it even easier to build with Notion. Now the API is out of beta, and better than ever.</p></div><div class="contentfulRichTextLayout_rtSpacingS__fOW8p"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><div role="button" class="lightbox_lightboxTrigger__pXsqp" aria-label="Open lightbox"><figure class="jsx-8c7c1d4505cd3a51 figure"><div class="jsx-8c7c1d4505cd3a51 media"><div style="max-width:960px;max-height:600px" class="jsx-1035270739 rounded-media"><div class="jsx-1035270739 animation--running appear-instantly"><video width="960" height="600" autoplay="" playsinline="" muted="" src="//videos.ctfassets.net/spoqsaf9291f/50KmoEedIK7tuQL5xobIxt/b4ba00eaffeed29af5bfa5face60e260/Integration_gallery_video.mp4" class="Video_video__KYz0l"></video></div></div></div></figure></div></div></div> <div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><ul class="contentfulRichText_list__89IEM"><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE"><strong class="contentfulRichText_strong__MaH0M">New Integration Gallery:</strong> Discover powerful integrations built by Notion and by our partners, learn more about what they do, and add them to your workspace, all in one place. Check it out at <a href="https://www.notion.com/integrations" class="InlineTextLink_inlineLink__oN8YM InlineTextLink_colorInherit__oGlTG">notion.com/integrations</a>.</p></div></li><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE"><strong class="contentfulRichText_strong__MaH0M">New API functionality and improved documentation</strong>: The API now supports even more block types, including synced blocks, multi-column pages, simple tables and more. Weâ€™ve also made the API more stable and reliable, and improved our documentation to make it easier for developers to build and test integrations.</p></div></li><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE"><strong class="contentfulRichText_strong__MaH0M">New controls for admins (Enterprise Plan):</strong> Admins on an Enterprise Plan can now pre-approve specific integrations for use in their workspace, for more transparency and control. Admins can also view which integrations are being used in their workspace, whoâ€™s using them, and disconnect integrations for specific users.</p></div></li></ul></div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE"><a href="https://developers.notion.com" class="InlineTextLink_inlineLink__oN8YM InlineTextLink_colorInherit__oGlTG">Learn more at developers.notion.com â†’</a></p></div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><div class="contentfulRichText_titleSpacingH3__wUQTI"><h3 id="better-dark-mode" class="title_title__DWL5N title_titleSizeS__om4Io title_titleWeightSemibold__RAo21 title_titleFamilyInter__Ra6_Q">Better dark mode</h3></div></div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Your Notion workspace is like a cozy living room, a place to hang out and get work done â€” and dark mode is like turning off the lights. It gives your space a different look and feel, and can be helpful with eye strain and readability too.</p></div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Now dark mode is even better! We updated the color palette to include deeper hues, higher contrast, and more saturated colors, keeping accessibility in mind throughout the redesign. To turn on dark mode in your workspace, go to <strong class="contentfulRichText_strong__MaH0M">Settings &amp; members</strong> â†’ <strong class="contentfulRichText_strong__MaH0M">My notifications &amp; settings</strong> â†’ <strong class="contentfulRichText_strong__MaH0M">Appearance</strong>.</p></div><div class="contentfulRichTextLayout_rtSpacingS__fOW8p"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><div role="button" class="lightbox_lightboxTrigger__pXsqp" aria-label="Open lightbox"><figure class="jsx-8c7c1d4505cd3a51 figure"><div class="jsx-8c7c1d4505cd3a51 media"><div style="max-width:960px;max-height:600px" class="jsx-1035270739 rounded-media"><div class="jsx-1035270739 animation--paused"><div><img alt="New dark mode" loading="lazy" width="960" height="600" decoding="async" data-nimg="1" class="next-image" style="color:transparent;width:100%;height:auto" <div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><div class="contentfulRichText_titleSpacingH3__wUQTI"><h3 id="bug-fixes-&amp;-improvements" class="title_title__DWL5N title_titleSizeS__om4Io title_titleWeightSemibold__RAo21 title_titleFamilyInter__Ra6_Q">Bug fixes &amp; improvements</h3></div></div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><ul class="contentfulRichText_list__89IEM"><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE"><strong class="contentfulRichText_strong__MaH0M">For a full list of API improvements, go to </strong><a href="https://developers.notion.com/changelog" class="InlineTextLink_inlineLink__oN8YM InlineTextLink_colorInherit__oGlTG">developers.notion.com/changelog â†’</a><strong class="contentfulRichText_strong__MaH0M"></strong></p></div></li><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Buttons within menus have a more modern look and feel with inset highlighting, and some icons were refreshed to use more consistent strokes</p></div></li><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Fixed a bug that prevented users from dragging pages into top-level pages in the sidebar when the â€œPrevent members from changing the Workspace sectionâ€ security setting was enabled</p></div></li><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Fixed a bug that caused the keyboard to flicker on iOS when tapping a to-do checkbox</p></div></li><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Fixed a bug that prevented the â€œselect allâ€ button from working properly on some iOS devices</p></div></li><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Fixed a bug that prevented the cursor from being placed in the correct spot on Android after tapping a text block</p></div></li><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Fixed a bug that caused the keyboard to disappear after tapping bullet items on Android</p></div></li><li class="contentfulRichText_listItem___Swmu"><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE">Fixed a bug that prevented tapping to drag cards in Board view on Android</p></div></li></ul></div><div class="contentfulRichText_bodyLimit__F5GOU" style="--rich-text-limit-max-width:none"><p class="contentfulRichText_paragraph___hjRE"></p></div></article></div><div class="release_share__lhL8L"><span class="jsx-f4adb663131852e5 smallcaps">Share this release</span><div class="Spacer_spacer__Hz1_q" style="min-height:10px"></div><div class="jsx-2495613766 share"><ul class="jsx-5e6e9854dbad1072"><li colors in simple tables, and lots of other mini-features and bug fixes to finish off the year.</p></a></article></div><div class="releasePreview_releasePreview__RDwrV"><div
